BASIC_CASE_INFORMATION.case_title: Kenya Power And Lighting Company Limited v Patrick Njane Mbugua another

PARTIES.plaintiff_appellant: Kenya Power And Lighting Company Limited

key_legal_issues: Ownership of the motor vehicle at the time of the accident
Evaluation of evidence regarding ownership and negligence
grounds_of_appeal: Error in evaluating evidence of ownership

relief_granted.trial: Kshs 800,000 in general damages and Kshs 63,860 in special damages

legal_principles_established: Vicarious liability requires clear ownership proof
LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.precedent_value: Clarifies burden of proof in ownership disputes
LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.case_law_cited: Selle v Associated Motor Boat Co

procedural_history: Appeal filed and decided on 04 May 2020

key_evidence: Medical evidence from Dr. Cyprus Oketch Okere
EVIDENCE_AND_DOCUMENTATION.expert_evidence: Medical evidence from Dr. Cyprus Oketch Okere
